original_text:
From the descendants of Simeon:
All the men twenty years old or more who were able to serve in the army were counted and listed by name, one by one, according to the records of their clans and families.
korean_text: 시므온의 아들들에게서 난 자를 그들의 종족과 조상의 가문에 따라 이십 세 이상으로 싸움에 나갈 만한 각 남자를 그 명수대로 다 계수하니

sentences.original_text: All the men twenty years old or more
sentences.korean_translation: 스무 살 이상 된 모든 남자들은

sentences.original_text: who were able to serve in the army
were counted and listed by name
according to the records of their clans
